patterns: about us
about us CEU Makati
About Us
About us
responses:
Two years before CEU's centennial celebration, on March 22, 2005, the community witneeded the birt of CEU Makati, Gil Puyat Campus. 
 The academic offerings included degree programs that responsded to the global market particularly Hote and Restaurant Management, Tourism Management, Information Technology, Computer Science, Business Administriation, Mass Communication major in Broadcasting, Master of Business Administration, and first-class health science programs for which CEU has always been known for such as Doctor of Dental Medicine, Medical Technology, Nursing, Pharmacy, Doctor of Pharmacy, and Psychology. 
Dr. Maria Cristina D. Padolina, the 7th CEU President, spearheaded the opening of the second campus of Centro Escolar Universit Makati-Legazpi in 2007 and the School of Law and Jurisprudence in 2009.

patterns: BSA
BSA - Bachelor of Science in Accountancy
Bachelor of Science in Accountancy
What are the courses available for BSA?
Bachelor of Science in Accountancy
What are offered in the Bachelor of Science in Accountancy?
BS of Accountancy
responses:
PROGRAM OUTCOMES OF BSA
The graduates of Bachelor of Science in Accountancy should be able to:
- Resolve business issues and problems with a global and strategic perspective using knowledge and technical proficiency in areas of financial accounting and reporting, cost accounting, management accounting and control, taxation, and accounting information systems;
- Conduct accountancy research through independent studies with relevant literature and appropriate use of accounting theory and methodologies;
- Employ technology as a business tool in capturing financial and non-financial information, generating reports and making decisions;
- Apply knowledge and skills to successfully respond to various types of assessments (including professional licensure examinations); and
- Confidently maintain a commitment to good corporate citizenship, social responsibility, and ethical practice in performing functions as an accountant.

EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES FOR BSA
Accounting/Finance Educator
Bookkeeper
Business Analyst
Chief Accountant
Consultant/Advisor
Comptroller
Cost Accountant
External Auditor
Financial Analyst
Internal Auditor
Staff Accountant
Tax Specialist

responses:
Graduates of the nursing program exhibit comprehensive knowledge across physical, social, natural, and health sciences, applying holistic care through reflective thinking and evidence-based practice while adhering to legal and ethical standards. They excel in effective communication, reporting, and teamwork, demonstrating management and leadership in client care with accountability and stewardship. Committed to lifelong learning, they engage in research to enhance nursing practice, embodying professionalism, integrity, and Filipino values. They leverage technology for innovative healthcare delivery, integrate entrepreneurial skills, and prioritize sustainability, ensuring excellence in their profession.

responses:
The Pharmacy degree curriculum aims to equip graduates with scientific competence, technical skills, and a compassionate, responsible approach to pharmacy practice. Graduates will possess a thorough understanding of patient-centered care, effective communication, and collaboration, enabling them to deliver comprehensive pharmaceutical services across various settings. They will be adept at performing pharmacy duties, designing innovative care programs, conducting research, and upholding ethical and legal standards. Committed to lifelong learning, they will continuously enhance their knowledge and skills to meet evolving healthcare needs.

patterns: BSITTM
BSITTM - Bachelor of Science in International Tourism and Travel Management
Bachelor of Science in International Tourism and Travel Management
What are the courses available for BSITTM
What are the courses offered in Bachelor of Science in International Tourism and Travel Management
responses:
A graduate of International Tourism and Travel Management is proficient in effective communication, executing tasks in diverse environments, problem-solving, and critical thinking within the tourism and hospitality industry. They uphold professional and ethical standards while delivering customer service, utilizing relevant technology applications, and leading advocacy programs for industry enhancement. Their skills extend to organizing tours, conducting insightful research, designing innovative marketing programs, and evaluating tourism sites for sustainability and socio-cultural impact, all aligned with national and international standards.
Department of Tourism (DOT)
Tourism Infrastructure and Enterprise Zone Authority
Tourism Promotions Board
Regional Officer of the Department of Tourism

Tour Operator
Tour Leader
Tourism Marketing Officer

patterns: Where are the main buildings located on Makati campus?

location of CEU Makati
responses:
CEU Makati has 2 campuses: 
 The Gil Puyat campus is located at 259 Sen. Gil J. Puyat Ave, Makati, 1203 Metro Manila 
 The Legazpi Village campus is located at 103 Esteban Street, Legazpi village, Makati, Kalakhang Maynila.

patterns: Are there any scholarship opportunities available for students?
Do you offer scholarships for students?
Scholarship opportunities for students
Available scholarships for students
responses:
Various scholarship programs are available to qualified students, be they entering freshmen or continuing students. Freshmen may avail of a scholarship, which is renewable upon fulfillment of certain requirements. In addition, continuing students may apply for scholarships funded by the University itself, alumni and friends of the University, and some corporations with interests in the University.

The University also provides financial grants to students who participate in extracurricular activities such as extramural, membership in the choir, leadership in student councils, or other similar groups.

Only one scholarship or financial grant shall be enjoyed by any student. In case a student is qualified for more than one university scholarship or grant, he/she may avail himself/herself of the higher or more generous grant.

patterns: Are there designated study spaces or quiet zones on campus?
Do you have study spaces or quiet zones on campus?
Designated study areas on campus
Quiet zones on campus
Where are available spaces for focused study?
Show me places to do heavy focused study
Where are designated study spaces on campus?
responses: Yes, there are designated study spaces and quiet zones on campus. The primary locations for focused study include the library and discussion rooms inside the library, providing students with conducive environments for academic work and research.

patterns: Are there on-campus dining options for students?
Do you have on-campus dining facilities?
Dining options on campus
Where to eat on campus?
Available food areas on campus?
I want to hangout with friends and eat together. Show me dining options on campus
responses: Yes, there are on-campus dining options for students. In the GP building, you can find dining facilities on the 3rd floor and also on the ground floor. Meanwhile, in the LV building, the dining options are located on the 6th floor.

patterns: What public transportation options are available near the campus?
Transportation options near campus
Public transportation near the campus
Are there any public transportation options near the campus?
Availability of public transpo
responses: For the GP campus, students have easy access to a wide range of public transportation options. However, at the LV campus, while most transportation is conveniently within a 5-minute walk, it's worth noting that train transportation will only be accessible after a 20-minute walk.

patterns: How can I access the university's Wi-Fi network on campus?
Wi-Fi access on campus
Connecting to campus Wi-Fi
Can I access the school wifi even I'm not enrolled?
How do I connect to the university's Wi-Fi network on campus?
Wifi
Wi-Fi
wifi
Wi-Fi on campus
responses: To connect to the university's Wi-Fi network on campus, enrollment is a prerequisite. Upon enrollment, you can gain access by providing your student ID and date of birth. Following this, the university will issue you a personalized username and password, facilitating your connection to the campus Wi-Fi.

patterns: When is the opening of admissions for School Year 2024-2025?
responses: Admissions for SY 2024-2025 are ongoing until August 2024. Please click here for your online application.

patterns: Will CEU conduct entrance exams for SY 2024-2025?
responses: NO ENTRANCE EXAMINATION for the school year 2024-2025.

patterns: How do I apply for Admission?
responses: To apply for admission, please click here for your online application.

patterns: What are the admission requirements for the first year undergraduate applicants?
responses: The admission requirements for first-year undergraduate applicants are the following: Original Form 138 for Grade 12 Report Card/PEPT Result/ ALSA & E Result, Certificate of Good Moral Character from High School Principal, and Certified True Copy of Birth Certificate.

patterns: May I ask for the list of matriculation fees?
responses: Please click here for the list of matriculation fees. You may also email the CEU Accounting Department for other concerns regarding the fees: CEU Manila - accountingdept@ceu.edu.ph, CEU Makati - accounting_cash_section@mkt.ceu.edu.ph, CEU Malolos - accounting_cash_section@mls.ceu.edu.ph.

patterns: How do I pay the Application Fee?
responses: Please click here for the online payment of the application fee.

patterns: How do I pay the Application Fee?
responses: Please click here for the online payment of the application fee.

patterns: I already submitted my Application Form on your website, but I did not receive any email on the status of my application. What steps do I need to follow?
responses: On your dashboard, you need to submit the following admission requirements in Step 3: Original Form 138 for Grade 12 Report Card/PEPT Result/ALS A&E Result, Certificate of Good Moral Character from High School Principal, Certified True Copy of Birth Certificate. Please email the Admission Section using the following CEU email address below for more information: CEU Manila: ceuadmission@ceu.edu.ph, CEU Makati: ceumakatiadmission@ceu.edu.ph, CEU Malolos: ceuadmissionmalolos@ceu.edu.ph.

patterns: Where can I edit my online Application Form?
responses: Please log in to your applicant account in the CEU Website to update your Application Form.

patterns: How will I know if I am qualified to enroll?
responses: You will receive an approval about your admission in Step 3 after you upload your admission requirements.

patterns: Can I pass the NSO Birth Certificate instead of PSA Birth Certificate for my online application?
responses: Yes, you can submit your NSO birth certificate.

patterns: Is the convenience fee already included in the Application Fee of Php 350?
responses: Yes, the convenience fee is already included in the application fee. You can pay the said fee using this link here.

patterns: Where can I submit my Certificate of Good Moral Character and High School Card?
responses: You will upload the requirements in Step 3 on your dashboard.

patterns: What are the Scholarships/Grants available in CEU?
responses: Please click this link here for the available scholarships and grants.

patterns: When is the start and the end of the First Semester, School Year 2024-2025?
responses: The start of classes for the First Semester, SY 2024-2025 will be in August 2024.

patterns: What platform will be used in online learning?
responses: All students will use CEU LEAPS (LEARNING ENHANCEMENTS AND PROFICIENCY SYSTEMS) Platform.

patterns: What are the requirements for a laptop or desktop to go online?
responses: The following are minimum requirements: OS- WINDOWS 7, 2 GHZ PROCESSOR, 1 GB RAM, BROWSER- GOOGLE CHROME, and INTERNET SPEED- 2 MBPS.

patterns: What will I do if I have concern/s regarding the CEU LEAPS?
responses: A student who has concerns in CEU LEAPS must send an email to the following CEU LEAPS SUPPORT email address: CEU Manila: tltdsupport@ceu.edu.ph, CEU Makati: tltsmakati@ceu.edu.ph, CEU Malolos: tltsmls@ceu.edu.ph.

patterns: What is the use of a CEU email account?
responses: The CEU email account, that can be found in Step 4, shall be used for all your official CEU communications, announcements, important activities, and messages.

patterns: Where can I get the schedule of payments if I choose installment basis?
responses: The schedule of payment of fees if you choose installment basis is reflected on the Certificate of Matriculation (COM) which will be given during the enrollment. The Accounting Department/Section will send a Statement of Account (SOA) two (2) weeks before the scheduled payment of fees. You may email the CEU Accounting Department/Section: CEU Manila - accountingdept@ceu.edu.ph, CEU Makati - accounting_cash_section@mkt.ceu.edu.ph, CEU Malolos - accounting_cash_section@mls.ceu.edu.ph.

patterns: What is the Grading System this school year?
responses: There will be two (2) grading periods: Midterm and Finals. The Class Participation grade will be composed of reports, quizzes, assignments, etc. which is multiplied by 2 and the Periodic Examination grade is multiplied by 1. These two will be added and will be divided by 3. The passing grade is 3.00. The grade of 4.00 is conditional and 5.00 is a failing mark.

patterns: What are the cut off grades for the different subjects?
responses: The cut-off grade for General Education subjects is 50%, 65% for the Professional Core subjects, and 70 % for the Professional subjects. The teacher will inform you on the cut off for each subject.

patterns: How can I apply for Bukas.ph?
responses: CEU partnered with Bukas.ph to provide the CEU students with tuition installment plans payable in 12 low monthly payments. With Bukas tuition plans, you can get up to P50,000 worth of tuition loan covered by Bukas in as fast as 3 to 5 days. Interested students may visit the Bukas website: https://bukas.ph/partners/ceu/ to apply or use the online calculator to get a FREE quotation.

patterns: How can I avail of discounted connectivity plans from the CEU Smart Online Store?
responses: Experience effortless shopping + FREE shipping nationwide by logging on to the following URLs using your CEU issued email: CEU Manila: http://ceu.smart, CEU Makati: http://makati.ceu.smart, CEU Malolos: http://malolos.ceu.smart

patterns: When is the deadline for the submission of the hard copies of the original admission credentials?
responses: The deadline for the submission of the hard copies of the admission credentials is on November 15, 2024.

patterns: How are the classes conducted?
responses: Please click this link here under University Life of Mode of Instruction on how classes are conducted in CEU.

patterns: What attire will I wear during the online classes?
responses: CEU will provide a white polo shirt that you can use during your online classes.

patterns: What are the different payment plans available?
responses: Plan A: Cash or Full payment, less 2% discount. Plan B: Down payment of Php 20,000 pesos upon enrollment plus one-time 600 pesos, balance payable in 4 installments (25%). Plan C: Down payment of Php 10,000 pesos upon enrollment plus one-time 600 pesos, balance payable in 4 installments (25%). Plan D: Down payment of Php 5,000 pesos upon enrollment plus one-time 600 pesos, balance payable in 4 installments (25%). Plan E: Down payment of any amount higher than Php 5000 plus one-time 600 pesos, balance payable in 4 installments (25%).

patterns: How do I access CEU LEAPS?
responses: Kindly click the link for the steps to access the CEU LEAPS: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Q__MRJZEcJ7IjG1-zJmZm2mSxs3ioGzs/view?usp=sharing.

patterns: Do you have University Orientation?
responses: The schedule of the University Orientation will be posted to your dashboard or sent through your CEU Email Account.
